channel.title: Server Problems PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
[left][center]Hello, Right heres the problem, i have my 508 source and i run it, my CMD says, Starting server on 43594. Which is fine, then i go to my I.P Changer client and run it. I enter my server and it does load!? it just stays on updating something :S. But when i load up my I.P Changer and enter 0.0.0.0 instead of my server name, it works.[/center][/left] [b]CAN ANYBODY HELP ME!!!![/b]
Please help me... i really want to start my server. [u][b]Thanks guys![/b][/u]

item.title: Server Problems PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @J_K0_U J K0 U
item.description:
@J_K0_U wrote:

Yeah but when my mate trys to connect from his PC it doesnt load for him. He put my server name in and it still doesnt load. :S

[color=black]Please help me :([/color][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2009, 07:03:35 am[/size][hr]Also when my mate trys to connect it doesnt load an then comes up with the error_5js… Yeah you know what i mean… please help

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problems PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

You don’t use your server IP, you either use 0.0.0.0 or localhost or 127.0.0.1 - anyone else that connects has to use your IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problems PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @J_K0_U J K0 U
item.description:
@J_K0_U wrote:

[left][center]Hello, Right heres the problem, i have my 508 source and i run it, my CMD says, Starting server on 43594. Which is fine, then i go to my I.P Changer client and run it. I enter my server and it does load!? it just stays on updating something :S. But when i load up my I.P Changer and enter 0.0.0.0 instead of my server name, it works.[/center][/left] CAN ANYBODY HELP ME!!!

Please help me… i really want to start my server. Thanks guys!
